section.name: 2 - Motion in a Straight Line
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Explain the meanings of position, displacement, distance traveled, velocity, and speed.
  • Convert between written descriptions, motion diagrams, position vs. time data, and position vs. time graphs.
  • Draw and interpret position vs. time and velocity vs. time graphs.
  • Write the position vs. time function for a motion given detailed information about the motion.
  • Calculate the relative velocity between two objects.
